title: Fennel, pea and mint soup
ingredients: ['600 g (1 lb 5 oz) fennel, chopped', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) fresh or frozen peas', '900 ml (1 pint 12 fl oz) vegetable stock', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh mint', 'Salt and black pepper', 'To garnish: a few small lettuce leaves, such as oak-leaf lettuce, and a few sprigs of fresh herbs, such as chervil and mint']
